Translations.Text: Ara yara amadera saksatera asa kare na tara bale, ‘amadera kache phirisata nayila kara haya na kena? Athaba amara amadera rabake dekhi na kena?’ Tara to tadera antare ahankara posana kare [1] ebam tara gurutara abadhyataya mete utheche
Yedina tara phirisataderake dekhate pabe sedina aparadhidera jan'ya kono susambada thakabe na ebam tara balabe, ‘raksa kara, raksa kara[1].’
Ara amara tadera krtakarmera prati agrasara haye seguloke biksipta dhulikanaya parinata karaba
Sedina jannatabasidera basasthana habe utkrsta ebam bisramasthala habe manorama
Ara sedina akasa bidirna habe meghapunja dbara [1] ebam dale dale phirisataderake namiye deya habe
se dina curanta kartrtba habe dayamayera [1] ebam kapheradera jan'ya se dina habe atyanta kathina
Yalima [1] byakti sedina nijera du‘hata dansana karate karate balabe, ‘haya, ami yadi rasulera sathe kono patha abalambana karatama
‘Haya, durbhoga amara, ami yadi amukake bandhurupe grahana na karatama
‘amake to se bibhranta karechila amara kache upadesa paumchara para.’ Ara sayatana to manusera jan'ya mahaprataraka
Ara rasula balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampradaya to e kura'anake parityajya sabyasta kareche.’
Allah‌ balena, ‘ara ebhabe'i amara pratyeka nabira jan'ya aparadhidera theke satru baniye thaki. Ara apanara raba'i pathapradarsaka o sahayyakarirupe yathesta.’

Ara kapherara bale, ‘samagra kura'ana tara kache ekabare nayila halo na kena?’ Ebhabe'i amara nayila karechi apanara hrdayake ta dbara mayabuta karara jan'ya ebam ta krame krame spastabhabe abrtti karechi
Ara tara apanara kache ye bisaya'i upasthita kare na kena, amara setara sathika samadhana o sundara byakhya apanara kache niye asi
Yaderake mukhera upara bhara diye cala abasthaya jahannamera dike ekatra kara habe, tara sthanera dika theke ati nikrsta ebam adhika pathabhrasta
Ara amara to musake kitaba diyechilama ebam tara sathe tara bha'i harunake sahayyakari karechilama
atahpara amara balechilama, ‘tomara se sampradayera kache ya'o yara amara nidarsanabalite mithyaropa kareche [1].’ Tarapara amara taderake sampurnarupe bidhbasta karechilama

ara nuhera sampradayake'o, yakhana tara rasulaganera prati mithya aropa karala [1] takhana amara taderake dubiye dilama ebam taderake manusera jan'ya nidarsanasbarupa kare rakhalama. Ara yalimadera jan'ya amara yantranadayaka sasti prastuta kare rekhechi
Ara amara dhbansa karechilama ‘ada, samuda, ‘ras‌’ [1] -era adhibasike ebam tadera antarbartikalera bahu prajanmake'o
ara amara tadera pratyekera jan'ya drstanta barnana karechilama ebam tadera sakalake'i amara sampurnarupe dhbansa karechilama
Ara tara to se janapada diye'i yatayata kare yara upara barsita hayechila akalyanera brsti, tabe ki tara esaba dekhate paya na [1]? Bastuta tara punarut'thanera asa'i kare na
Ara tara yakhana apanake dekhe, takhana tara apanake sudhu thatta-bidrarupera patrarupe ganya kare, bale, ‘e-i ki se, yake allah‌ rasula kare pathiyechena

‘se to amaderake amadera upasyagana hate dure sariye'i dita, yadi na amara tadera anugatyera upara abicala thakatama.’ Ara yakhana tara sasti pratyaksa karabe, takhana janate parabe ke adhika pathabhrasta
Apani ki take dekhechena, ye tara prabrttike ilaharupe grahana kare? Tabu'o ki apani tara yim'madara habena
naki apani mane karena ye, tadera adhikansa sone athaba bojhe? Tara to pasura mata'i; baram tara ara'o adhika pathabhrasta
Apani ki apanara rabera prati laksya karena na [1] kibhabe tini chaya samprasarita karena? Tini icche karale etake to sthira rakhate paratena; tarapara amara suryake karechi era nirdesaka
Tarapara amara etake amadera dike dhire dhire gutiye ani
Ara tini'i tomadera jan'ya ratake karechena abaranasbarupa, bisramera jan'ya tomadera diyechena nidraa [1] ebam chariye parara jan'ya karechena dina
Ara tini'i tamra rahamatera brstira age susambadabahirupe bayu prerana karena ebam amara akasa hate pabitra pani barsana kari
yate ta dbara amara mrta bhu-khandake sanjibita kari ebam amara ya srsti karechi tara madhya hate bahu jibajantu o manusake ta pana kara'i
ara amara to ta tadera madhye bitarana kari yate tara smarana kare. Atahpara adhikansa loka sudhu akrtajnata'i prakasa kare
Ara amara icche karale pratiti janapade ekajana satarkakari pathate paratama
Kaje'i apani kapheradera anugatya karabena na ebam apani kura'anera sahayye tadera sathe bara jihada caliye yana
Ara tini'i du'i sagarake samantarale prabahita karechena, ekati mista, supeya ebam an'yati lona, khara; ara tini ubhayera madhye rekhe diyechena eka antaraya, eka anatikramya byabadhana
Ara tini'i manusake srsti karechena pani hate; tarapara tini take bansagata o baibahika samparkasila karechena [1]. Ara apanara raba halena prabhuta ksamatabana
Ara tara allah‌ra paribarte emana kichura ‘ibadata kare ya tadera upakara karate pare na ebam tadera apakara'o karate pare na. Ara kaphera to tara rabera birodhitaya sahayogitakari
Ara amara to apanake sudhu susambadadata o satarkakarirupe'i pathiyechi
Baluna, ‘ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono binimaya ca'i na, tabe ye tara rabera dikera patha abalambana karara icche kare.’
Ara apani nirbhara karuna tamra upara yini ciranjiba, yini marabena na ebam tamra saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna, tini tamra bandadera papa samparke abahita hisebe yathesta

Tini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti sabakichu chaya dine srsti karena; tarapara tini ‘arasera upara uthalena. Tini'i ‘rahamana’, sutaram tamra sambandhe ye abahita take jijnesa kare dekhuna

Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘sajadabanata ha'o ‘rahamana’ -era prati,’ takhana tara bale, ‘rahamana abara ki [1]? Tumi ka'uke sajada karate balale'i ki amara take sajada karaba?’ Ara ete tadera palayanaparata'i brd'dhi paya
Kata barakatamaya tini yini nabhomandale srsti karechena bisala tarakapunja ebam tate sthapana karechena pradipa [1] o alo bikiranakari camda
Ara tini'i karechena rata o dinake parasparera anugamirupe tara jan'ya--- ye upadesa grahana karate ba krtajna hate caya
Ara ‘rahamana’ -era banda tara'i, yara yamine atyanta binamrabhabe calaphera kare [1] ebam yakhana jahela byaktira taderake (asalina bhasaya) sambodhana kare, takhana tara bale, ‘salama’
ebam tara rata atibahita kare tadera rabera uddesye sijadabanata haye o damriye theke
ebam tara bale, he amadera raba! Apani amadera theke jahannamera sasti hatiye dina, tara sasti to abicchinna
Niscaya seta basabasa o abasthanasthala hisebe khuba nikrsta
Ebam yakhana tara byaya kare takhana apabyaya kare na, krpanata'o kare na, ara tadera pantha haya etadubhayera madhyabarti

Ebam tara allah‌ra sathe kono ilahake dake na [1]. Ara allah‌ yara hatya nisedha karechena, yathartha karana chara take hatya kare na [2]. Ara tara byabhicara kare na [3]; ye egulo kare, se sasti bhoga karabe
Kiyamatera dina tara sasti bardhitabhabe pradana kara habe ebam sekhane se sthayi habe hina abasthaya
tabe ye ta'oba kare, imana ane o satkaja kare, phale allah‌ tadera gunahasamuha neka dbara paribartana kare debena. Ara allah‌ ksamasila, parama dayalu
Ara ye ta'oba kare o satkaja kare, se to sampurnarupe allah‌ra abhimukhi haya
Ara yara mithyara saksya haya na ebam asara karyakalapera sam'mukhina hale apana maryada raksarthe ta parihara kare cale
Ebam yara tadera rabera ayatasamuha smarana kariye dile tara upara andha ebam badhirera mata pare thake na

Ebam yara prarthana kare bale, ‘he amadera raba! Amadera jan'ya emana stri o santana-santati dana karuna yara habe amadera jan'ya cokhajurano. Ara apani amaderake karuna muttakidera jan'ya anusaranayogya
Tara'i, yaderake pratidana hisebe deya habe jannatera su'ucca kaksa [1] yehetu tara chila dhairyasila. Ara tara prapta habe sekhane abhibadana o salama
Sekhane tara sthayi habe. Abasthanasthala o basasthana hisebe ta kata utkrsta
baluna, ‘amara raba tomadera mote'i bhraksepa karena na, yadi na tomara take daka [1]. Atahpara tomara mithyaropa karecha, sutaram acire'i apariharya habe sasti.’
Tba-sina-mima
Egulo suspasta kitabera ayata
Tara mumina hacche na bale apani hayata manokaste atmaghati haye parabena
Amara icche karale asamana theke tadera kache eka nidarsana nayila karatama, phale setara prati tadera ghara binata haye parata
Ara yakhana'i tadera kache dayamayera kacha theke kono natuna upadesa ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukha phiriye neya
Ata'eba, tara to mithyaropa kareche. Kaje'i tara ya niye thatta-bidrupa karata tara prakrta barta tadera kache sighra'i ese parabe
Tara ki yaminera dike laksya kare na? Amara tate pratyeka prakarera aneka utkrsta udbhida udgata karechi
niscaya ete ache nidarsana, ara tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara niscaya apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
Ara smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba musake deke balalena, ‘apani yalima sampapradayera kache yana
‘phira‘a'unera sampapradayera kache; tara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na?’
Musa balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Ami asanka karachi ye, tara amara upara mithyaropa karabe
‘ebam amara baksa sankucita haye parache, ara amara jihba to sabalila ne'i. Kaje'i harunera prati'o ohi pathana
‘Ara amara birud'dhe to tadera eka abhiyoga ache, sutaram ami asanka karachi ye, tara amake hatya karabe.’
Allah‌ balalena, ‘na, kakhana'i naya, ata'eba apanara ubhaye amadera nidarsanasaha yana, amara to apanadera sathe'i achi, srabanakari
‘Ata'eba, apanara ubhaye phira‘a'unera kache yana ebam baluna, ‘amara to srstikulera rabera rasula
yate tumi amadera sathe yete da'o bani isara'ilake [1].’
Phira‘a'una balala, ‘amara ki tomake saisabe amadera madhye lalana-palana karini? Ara tumi to tomara jibanera bahu bachara amadera madhye katiyecha
‘ebam tumi tomara kaja ya karara ta karecha; tumi to akrtajna.’
Musa balalena, ‘ami to eta karechilama takhana, yakhana ami chilama bibhraanta’

‘Tarapara ami yakhana tomadera bhaye bhita halama takhana ami tomadera kacha theke paliye giyechilama. Erapara amara raba amake prajna (nabu'oyata) diyechena ebam amake rasuladera antarbhukta karechena
‘Ara amara prati tomara ye anugrahera katha ullekha kare tumi daya dekhaccha ta to e'i ye, tumi bani isara'ilake dase parinata karecha [1].’
Phira‘a'una balala, ‘srstikulera raba abara ki?’
Musa balalena, ‘tini asamanasamuha o yamina ebam tadera madhyabarti saba kichura raba, yadi tomara niscita bisbasi ha'o.’
Phira‘a'una tara asepasera lokadera laksa kare balala, ‘tomara ki bhala kare sunacha na?’
Musa balalena, ‘tini tomadera raba ebam tomadera purbapurusadera'o raba.’
Phira‘a'una balala, ‘tomadera prati prerita tomadera rasula to abasya'i pagala.’
Musa balalena, ‘tini purba o pascimera ebam tadera madhyabarti saba kichura raba; yadi tomara bujhe thako!’
Phira‘a'una balala, ‘tumi yadi amara paribarte an'yake ilaharupe grahana kara ami tomake abasya'i kararud'dha karaba.’
Musa balalena, ‘ami yadi tomara kache kono spasta bisaya niye asi, tabu'o [1]?’
Phira‘a'una balala, ‘tumi yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe ta upasthita kara.’
Tarapara musa tamra lathi niksepa karale tatksanat ta eka spasta ajagare [1] parinata hala
Ara musa tara hata bera karale tatksanat ta darsakadera drstite subhra ujjbala pratibhata hala
Phira‘a'una tara asepasera parisadabargake balala, ‘e to eka sudaksa jadukara
‘se tomaderake tomadera desa theke tara jadubale bahiskrta karate caya. Ekhana tomara ki karate bala?’
Tara balala, ‘take o tara bha'ike kichu abakasa da'o ebam nagare nagare sangrahakaderake patha'o
‘yena tara tomara kache pratiti abhijna jadukarake upasthita kare.’
Atahpara eka nirdharita dine nirdista samaye jadukaraderake ekatra kara hala
ebam lokaderake bala hala, ‘tomara'o samabeta hacche ki
‘yena amara jadukaradera anusarana karate pari, yadi tara bijayi haya.’
Atahpara jadukarera ese phira‘a'unake balala, ‘amara yadi bijayi ha'i amadera jan'ya puraskara thakabe to?’
Phira‘a'una balala, ‘hyam, takhana to tomara abasya'i amara ghanisthadera samila habe.’
Musa taderake balalena, ‘tomara ya niksepa karara ta niksepa kara.’
Atahpara tara tadera rasi o lathi niksepa karala ebam tara balala, ‘phira‘a'unera iyayatera sapatha! Amara'i to bijayi haba.’
Atahpara musa tara lathi niksepa karalena, sahasa seta tadera alika kirtiguloke graasa karate lagala
Takhana jadukarera sajadabanata haye parala
Tara balala, ‘amara imana analama srstikulera rabera prati
‘yini musa o harunera'o raba.’

Phira‘a'una balala, ‘ki! Ami tomaderake anumati deyara age'i tomara tara prati bisbasa karale? Se-i to tomadera pradhana ye tomaderake jadu siksa diyeche. Sutaram sighra'i tomara era parinama janabe. Ami abasya'i tomadera hata ebam tomadera pa biparita dika theke kete phelaba ebam tomadera saba'ike sulabid'dha karaba'i.’
Tara balala, ‘kono ksati ne'i [1], amara to amadera rabera kache'i pratyabartanakari
Amara asa kari ye, amadera raba amadera aparadha ksama karabena, karana amara muminadera madhye agrani.’
Ara amara musara prati ohi karechilama e marme ye, ‘amara bandaderake niye rate bera ha'una [1], abasya'i tomadera pascad'dhabana kara habe.’
Tarapara phira‘a'una sahare sahare loka sangrahakari pathala
e bale, ‘era to ksudra ekati dala
ara tara to amadera kraodha udreka kareche
Ara amara to saba'i sada satarka.’
Pariname amara phira‘a'una gosthike bahiskrta karalama tadera udyanaraji o prasrabana hate
ebam dhana-bhandara o suramya saudhamala hate
Erupa'i ghatechila ebam amara bani isara'ilake karechilama esabera adhikari
Atahpara tara suryodayakale tadera pichane ese parala
Atahpara yakhana du‘dala parasparake dekhala, takhana musara sangira balala, ‘amara to dhara pare gelama!’
Musa balalena, ‘kakhana'i naya! Amara sange achena amara raba [1]; satbara tini amake pathanirdesa karabena.’
Atahpara amara musara prati ohi karalama ye, apanara lathi dbara sagare aghata karuna. Phale ta bibhakta pratyeka bhaga bisala parbatera mata haye gela
ara amara sekhane kache niye elama an'ya dalatike
ebam amara ud'dhara karalama musa o tara sangi sakalake
tarapara nimajjita karalama an'ya dalatike
Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
Ara apani tadera kache ibarahimera brttanta barnana karuna
Yakhana tini tara pita o tara sampradayake balechilena, ‘tomara kisera ibadata kara?’
Tara balala, ‘amara murtira puja kari sutaram amara nisthara sathe seguloke amkare thakaba.’
Tini balalena, ‘tomara yakhana ahbana kara takhana tara tomadera ahbana sone ki?’
‘Athaba tara ki tomadera upakara kimba apakara karate pare?’
Tara balala, ‘na, tabe amara amadera pitrpurusaderake peyechi, tara erupa'i karata.’
Ibarahima balalena, ‘tomara ki bhabe dekhecha, yadera ‘ibadata tomara kare thaka
‘tomara ebam tomadera purbabarti pitrpurusara
srstikulera raba byatita era saba'i to amara satrau
‘Yini amake srsti karechena, atahpara tini'i amake hedayata diyechena
Ara ‘tini'i amake kha'oyana o pana karana
‘Ebam rogakranta hale tini'i amake arogya dana karena
‘Ara tini'i amara mrtyu ghatabena, tarapara amake punarjibita karabena
‘Ebam yara kache asa kari ye, tini kiyamatera dina amara aparadha ksama kare debena
‘He amara raba! Amake prajna dana karuna ebam satkarmasiladera sathe miliye dina
‘Ara amake parabartidera madhye yasasbi karuna
‘ebam amake sukhamaya jannatera adhikaridera antarbhukta karuna
‘ara amara pitake ksama karuna, tini to pathabhrastadera samila chilena
‘Ebam amake lanchita karabena na punarut'thanera dine
‘ye dina dhana-sampada o santana-santati kono kaje asabe na
‘se dina upakrta habe sudhu se, ye allah‌ra kache asabe bisud'dha antahkarana niye.’
Ara muttakidera nikatabarti kara habe jannata
ebam pathabhrastadera jan'ya unmocita kara habe jahannama
taderake bala habe, ‘tara kothaya, tomara yadera ‘ibadata karate
‘allah‌ra paribarte? Tara ki tomadera sahayya karate pare athaba tara ki atmaraksa karate saksama?’
Atahpara taderake ebam patha bhrastakariderake jahanname niksepa kara habe adhomukhi kare
ebam ibalisera bahinira sakalake'o
Tara sekhane bitarke lipta haye balabe
‘allah‌ra sapatha! Amara to spasta pathabhrastataya nimajjita chilama,’
‘yakhana amara tomaderake srstikulera rabera samakaksa ganya karatama
‘Ara amaderake kebala duskrtikarira'i pathabhrasta karechila
‘ata'eba, amadera kono suparisakari ne'i
Ebam kono sahrdaya bandhu'o ne'i
‘Haya, yadi amadera ekabara phire ya'oyara suyoga ghatata, tahale amara muminadera antarbhukta haye yetama [1]!’
Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
Nuhera sampradaya rasulaganera prati mithya aropa karechila
Yakhana tadera bha'i nuha taderake balechilena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
‘Ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula
‘Ata'eba, tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
‘Ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na; amara puraskara to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache
‘Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara.’
Tara balala, ‘amara ki tomara prati bisbasa sthapana karaba athaca itarajanera tomara anusarana karache?’
Nuha balalena, ‘tara ki karata ta amara janara ki darakara?’
‘Tadera hiseba grahana to amara rabera'i kaja; yadi tomara bujhate
ara ami to ‘muminaderake tariye deyara na'i
‘Ami to sudhu ekajana spasta satarkakari.’
Tara balala, ‘he nuha! Tumi yadi nibrtta na ha'o tabe tumi abasya'i patharera aghate nihatadera madhye samila habe.’
Nuha balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampradaya to amara upara mithyaropa kareche
Kaje'i apani amara o tadera madhye spasta mimansa kare dina ebam amake o amara sathe yesaba mumina ache, taderake raksa karuna [1].’
Atahpara amara take o tara sange yara chila, taderake raksa karalama bojha'i nauyane
Erapara amara baki saba'ike dubiye dilama
Ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i imanadara naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
‘Ada sampradaya rasuladera prati mithyaropa karechila
Yakhana tadera bha'i huda taderake balalena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
‘ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula
‘Ata'eba, tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
‘Ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na, amara puraskara to srstikulera rabera kache'i
‘Tomara ki pratiti ucca sthane [1] stambha nirmana karacha nirarthaka
‘ara tomara prasadasamuha [1] nirmana karacha yena tomara sthayi habe
Ara yakhana tomara aghata hana takhana aghata hene thaka sbecchacari haye
Sutaram tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
Ara tomara tamra taka'oya abalambana kara yini tomaderake dana karechena se samudaya, ya tomara jana
Tini tomaderake dana karechena catuspada jantu o putra santana
ebam udyana o prasrabana
‘ami to tomadera jan'ya asanka kari mahadinera sastira.’
Tara balala, ‘tumi upadesa da'o ba na-i da'o, ubhaya'i amadera jan'ya samana
‘Eta to kebala purbabartidera'i sbabhaba
‘Amara mote'i sastiprapta habo na.’
Sutaram tara tara prati mithyaropa karala phale amara taderake dhbansa karalama. Ete to abasya'i ache nidarsana; kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
Samuda sampradaya rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila
Yakhana tadera bha'i saliha taderake balalena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
‘ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula
Sutaram tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
‘ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na, amara pratidana to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache
‘Tomaderake ki nirapada abasthaya chere rakha habe, ya ekhane ache tate
‘udyane, prasrabane
‘o sasyaksetre ebam sukomala guccha bisista khejura bagane
‘ara tomara naipunyera sathe pahara kete ghara nirmana karacha
Sutaram tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
ara tomara simalanghanakaridera nirdesera anugatya karo na
‘yara yamine biparyaya srsti kare ebam sansodhana kare na.’
Tara balala, ‘tumi to jadugrastadera an'yatama
‘Tumi to amadera mata'i ekajana manusa, kaje'i tumi yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe ekati nidarsana upasthita kara.’
Saliha balalena, ‘eta ekata ustrai, era jan'ya ache pani panera pala ebam tomadera jan'ya ache nirdharita dine pani panera pala
‘ara tomara era kono anista sadhana karo na; karale mahadinera sasti tomadera upara apatita habe.’
Atahpara tara setake hatya karala, pariname tara anutapta hala
Atahpara sasti taderake graasa karala. Ete abasya'i rayeche nidarsana, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
Lutera sampradaya rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila
yakhana tadera bha'i luta taderake balalena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
‘ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula
‘Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
‘Ara ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono pratidana ca'i na, amara pratidana to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache
‘Srstikulera madhye to tomara'i ki purusera sathe upagata ha'o
‘ara tomadera raba tomadera jan'ya ye striganake srsti karechena taderake tomara barjana kare thaka. Baram tomara to eka simalanghanakari sampradaya.’
Tara balala, ‘he luta! Tumi yadi nibrtta na ha'o, tabe abasya'i tumi nirbasita habe.’
Luta balalena, ‘ami abasya'i tomadera e kajera ghrnakari
‘He amara raba! Amake ebam amara paribara-parijanake, tara ya kare ta theke raksa karuna.’
Tarapara amara take ebam tara paribara-parijanake sakalake raksa karalama
Eka brd'dha chara [1], ye chila pichane abasthanakaridera antarbhukta
Tarapara amara apara sakalake dhbansa karalama
Ara amara tadera upara sasti mulaka brsti barsana karechilama, bhiti pradarsitadera jan'ya e brsti chila kata nikrsta
ete to abasya'i nidarsana rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
A'ikabasira [1] rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila
Yakhana su‘a'iba taderake balechilena, ‘tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
ami to tomadera jan'ya eka bisbasta rasula
‘Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara
‘Ara ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono pratidana ca'i na. Amara puraskara to srstikulera rabera kache'i ache
‘Mape purna matraya debe; ara yara mape kama deya tomara tadera antarbhukta hayo na
‘ebam ojana karabe sathika damripallaya
‘Ara lokaderake tadera prapya bastu kama di'o na ebam prthibite biparyaya srsti kare beri'o na
Ara tamra taka'oya abalambana kara yini tomaderake o tomadera age yara gata hayeche taderake srsti karechena.’
Tara balala, ‘tumi to jadugrastadera antarbhukta
‘ara tumi to amadera mata'i ekajana manusa, amara to tomake mithyabadidera antarbhukta mane kari
‘Sutaram tumi yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe akasera eka khanda amadera upara phele da'o.’
Tini balalena, ‘amara raba bhala kare janena tomara ya kara.’
Sutaram tara tara prati mithyaropa karala, phale taderake meghacchanna dinera sasti grasa karala [1]. E to chila eka bhisana dinera sasti
ete to abasya'i rayeche nidarsana [1], ara tadera adhikansa'i mumina naya
Ara apanara raba, tini to parakramasali, parama dayalu
Ara niscaya eta (ala-kura'ana) srstikulera raba hate nayilakrta
Bisbasta ruha (jibara'ila) ta niye nayila hayechena
Apanara hrdaye, yate apani satarkakaridera antarbhukta hate parena
Suspasta arabi bhasaya
Ara purbabarti kitabasamuhe abasya'i era ullekha ache
Bani isara'ilera alemagana e samparke jane---eta ki tadera jan'ya nidarsana naya
ara amara yadi eta kono anarabera upara nayila karatama
ebam eta se tadera kache patha karata, tabe tara tate imana anata na
ebhabe amara seta aparadhidera antare sancara karechi
Tara ete imana anabe na yataksana na tara yantranadayaka sasti dekhate pabe
sutaram ta tadera kache ese parabe hathat kare; athaca tara kichu'i upalabdhi karate parabe na
Takhana tara balabe, ‘amaderake ki abakasa deya habe?’
Tara ki tabe amadera sasti tbaranbita karate caya
apani bhebe dekhuna, yadi amara taderake dirghakala bhoga-bilasa karate de'i
tarapara taderake ye bisaye satarka kara hayechila ta tadera kache ese pare
takhana ya tadera bhoga-bilasera upakarana hisebe deya hayechila ta tadera ki upakare asabe
ara amara emana kono janapada dhbansa karini yara jan'ya satarkakari chila na
(tadera jan'ya) smarana hisebe, ara amara yulumakari na'i
ara sayatanara etasaha nayila hayani
Ara tara e kajera yogya'o naya ebam tara era samarthya'o rakhe na
Taderake to sonara suyoga hate dure rakha hayeche
Ata'eba apani an'ya kono ilahake allah‌ra sathe dakabena na, dakale apani sastipraptadera antarbhukta habena
Ara apanara nikatastha jnati-gosthike satarka karuna
Ebam yara apanara anusarana kare sesaba muminadera prati apanara paksaputa abanata kare dina
Atahpara tara yadi apanara abadhya haya tahale apani baluna, ‘tomara ya kara niscaya ami ta theke dayamukta.’
Ara apani nirbhara karuna parakramasali, parama dayalu allah‌ra upara
yini apanake dekhena yakhana apani damrana
ebam sajadakaridera majhe apanara uthabasa
Tini to sarbasrota, sarbajna
Tomaderake ki ami janaba kara kache sayatanara nayila haya
tara to nayila haya pratyekati ghora mithyabadi o papira kache
Tara kana pete thake ebam tadera adhikansa'i mithyabadi
Ara kabigana, tadera anusarana to bibhraantara'i kare
Apani ki dekhena na ye, ora udabhraanta haye pratyeka upatyakaya ghure beraya
ebam tara to bale emana katha, ya tara kare na

Kintu tara chara yara imana eneche, satkaja kareche, allah‌ke besi parimana smarana kareche ebam atyacarita ha'oyara para pratisodha grahana kareche. Ara yalimara sighra'i phire yabe janabe kona dharanera gantabyasthale tara phire yabe
Tba-sina; egulo ala-kura'ana ebam suspasta kitabera ayata
pathanirdesa o susambada muminadera jan'ya
Yara salata kayema kare o yakata deya ara tara'i akherate niscita bisbasa rakhe
Niscaya yara akherate imana ane na, tadera jan'ya tadera kajake amara sobhana karechi [1], phale tara bibhranta haye ghure beraya
tadera'i jan'ya rayeche nikrsta sasti ebam tara'i akherate sarbadhika ksatigrastha
Ara niscaya apani ala-kura'ana prapta hacchena prajnamaya, sarbajnera nikata theke

Smarana karuna, yakhana musa tara paribarera lokaderake balechilena, ‘niscaya ami aguna dekhechi, acire'i ami sekhana theke tomadera jan'ya kono khabara anaba athaba tomadera jan'ya anaba jalanta angara, yate tomara aguna pohate para [1].’
Atahpara tini yakhana setara kache asalena [1], takhana ghosita hala, ‘barakatamaya, ya ache e alora madhye ebam ya ache era carapase [2], ara srstikulera raba allah‌ pabitra o mahimanbita
‘he musa! Niscaya ami allah‌ [1]! Parakramasali, prajnamaya

‘ara apani apanara lathi niksepa karuna.’ Tarapara yakhana tini setake sapera mata chutochuti karate dekhalena takhana tini pichanera dike chutate lagalena [1] ebam phire'o takalena na. ‘He musa! Bhita habena na, niscaya ami emana ye, amara sannidhye rasulagana bhaya paya na
‘tabe ye yuluma kare, [1] tarapara tarapara manda kajera paribarte satkaja kare, tahale niscaya ami ksamasila, parama dayalu

‘Ara apani apanara hata apanara bagale rakhuna, eta bera haye asabe subhra nirdosa abasthaya. Eta phira‘a'una o tara sampradayera kache anita nayati nidarsanera antargata [1]. Tara to chila phaseka sampradaya.’
Atahpara yakhana tadera kache amadera nidarsanasamuha drsyamana hala, tara balala, ‘eta suspasta jadu.’

Ara tara an'yaya o ud'dhatabhabe nidarsanagulo pratyakhyana karala, yadi'o tadera antara eguloke niscita satya bale grahana karechila [1]. Sutaram dekhuna, biparyaya srstikaridera parinama kemana hayechila
ara abasya'i amara da'uda o sula'imanake jnana dana karechilama [1] ebam tara ubhaye balechilena, ‘sakala prasansa allah‌ra yini amaderake tamra bahu mumina bandadera upara sresthatba diyechena [2].’

Ara sula'imana hayechilena da'udera uttaradhikari [1] ebam tini balechilena, ‘he manusa! Amaderake [2] pakhidera bhasa siksa deya hayeche ebam amaderake sabakichu deya hayeche [3], eta abasya'i suspasta anugraha.’
Ara sula'imanera samane samabeta kara hala tara bahinike---jina, manusa o bihangakulake ebam taderake bin'yasta kara hala bibhinna byuhe

Abasese yakhana tara pipara adhyusita upatyakaya paumchala takhana eka pipara balala, ‘he pipara-bahini! Tomara tomadera ghare prabesa kara, yena sula'imana ebam tara bahini tadera ajnatasare tomaderake payera nice pise na phele.’

Atahpara sula'imana tara e kathate mrdu hasalena ebam balalena, ‘he amara raba! Apani amake samarthya dina [1] yate ami apanara prati krtajnata prakasa karate pari, amara prati o amara pita-matara prati apani ye anugraha karechena tara jan'ya ebam yate ami emana satkaja karate pari ya apani pachanda karena [2]. Ara apanara anugrahe amake apanara satkarmaparayana bandadera samila karuna [3].’
Ara sula'imana pakhidera sandhana nilena [1] ebam balalena, ‘amara ki halo [2] ye, ami hudahudake dekhachi na! Na ki se anupasthita
‘ami abasya'i take kathina sasti deba kimba take yabeha karaba [1] athaba se amara nikata upayukta karana darsabe [2].’
Kichuksana pare'i hudahuda ese parala ebam balala, ‘apani ya jnane paribestana karate parenani ami ta paribestana karechi [1] ebam ‘saba’ [2] hate suniscita sambada niye esechi
‘Ami to eka narike dekhalama tadera upara rajatba karache [1]. Take deya hayeche sakala kichu hate'i [2] ebam tara ache eka birata sinhasana

‘Ami take o tara sampradayake dekhalama tara allah‌ra paribarte suryake sajada karache [1]. Ara sayatana [2] tadera karyabali tadera kache susobhita kare diyeche ebam taderake satpatha theke badhagrastha kareche, phale tara hedayeta pacchena
‘nibrtta kareche e jan'ye ye, tara yena sajada na kare allah‌ke, yini asamanasamuha o yaminera lukkayita bastuke bera karena [1]. Ara yini janena ya tomara gopana kara ebam ya tomara byakta kara
‘Allah‌, tini chara satya kono ilaha ne'i, tini maha‘arasera raba [1].’
Sula'imana balalena, ‘amara dekhaba tumi ki satya balecha, naki tumi mithyukadera antarbhukta
‘tumi ya'o amara e patra niye ebam eta tadera kache niksepa kara; tarapara tadera kacha theke sare theko [1] ebam laksya karo tadera pratikriya ki?’
Se nari balala, ‘he parisadabarga! Amake eka sam'manita patra [1] deya hayeche
‘niscaya eta sula'imanera kacha theke ebam niscaya eta rahamana, rahima allah‌ra name
‘yate tomara amara birodhitara aud'dhatya prakasa na karo ebam anugatya sbikara kare amara kache upasthita ha'o [1].’
Se nari balala, ‘he parisadabarga! Amara e byapare tomadera matamata da'o [1]. Ami kono byapare curanta sid'dhanta grahana kari na tomadera upasthiti chara
Tara balala, ‘amara to saktisali o kathora yod'dha; tabe sid'dhanta grahanera ksamata apanara'i, ki adesa karabena ta apani bhebe dekhuna.’
Se nari balala, ‘raja-badasara yakhana kono janapade prabesa kare takhana to setake biparyasta kare deya ebam sekhanakara maryadabana byaktiderake apadasta kare, ara erupa kara'i tadera riti
‘ara ami to tadera nikata upadhaukana pathacchi, dekhi, dutera ki niye phire ase [1].’

Atahpara duta sula'imanera kache asale sula'imana balalena, ‘tomara ki amake dhana-sampada diye sahayya karacha? Allah‌ amake ya diyechena, ta tomaderake ya diyechena tara ceye utkrsta [1] baram tomara'i tomadera upadhaukana niye utphulla bodha kara

‘Tadera kache phire ya'o, atahpara amara abasya'i tadera birud'dhe niye asaba eka sain'ya bahini yara mukabila karara sakti tadera ne'i. Ara amara abasya'i taderake sekhana theke bahiskrta karaba lanchitabhabe ebam tara habe apadastha.’
Sula'imana balalena, ‘he parisadabarga! Tara atmasamarpana kare [1] amara kache asara [2] age tomadera madhye ke tara sinhasana amara kache niye asabe
eka saktisali jina balala, ‘apani apanara sthana theke uthara age'i ami ta ene deba [1] ebam e byapare ami abasya'i saktimana, bisbasta [2].’

Kitabera jnana yara chila [1], se balala, ‘apani cokhera palaka phelara age'i ami ta apanake ene deba.’ Atahpara sula'imana yakhana ta samane sthira abasthaya dekhalena takhana tini balalena, ‘e amara rabera anugraha, yate tini amake pariksa karena ye, ami krtajnata prakasa kari, na akrtajnata prakasa kari. Ara ye krtajnata prakasa kare, se to krtajnata prakasa kare nijera'i kalyanera jan'ya, ara ye ke'u akrtajna habe, se jene rakhuka ye, amara raba abhabamukta, mahanubhaba [2].’
Sula'imana balalena, ‘tomara tara sinhasanera akrti tara kache aparicita kare badale da'o; dekhi se sathika disa paya, na se tadera antarbhukta yadera disa ne'i

atahpara se nari yakhana asala, takhana take jijnesa kara hala, ‘tomara sinhasana ki erupa'i?’ Se balala, ‘mane haya eta seta'i. Ara amaderake itipurbe'i prakrta jnana dana kara hayeche ebam amara ajnabaha'o haye gechi [1].’
Ara allah‌ra paribarte se yara puja karata seta'i take nibrtta karechila [1], se to chila kaphera sampradayera antarbhukta

Take bala hala, ‘prasadatite prabesa kara.’ Atahpara yakhana se seta dekhala takhana se setake eka gabhira jalasaya mane karala ebam se tara payera gocha duto anabrta karala. Sula'imana balalena, eta to sbaccha sphatika mandita prasada. Se'i nari balala, ‘he amara raba! Ami to nijera prati yuluma karechilama [1], ara ami sula'imanera sathe srstikulera raba allah‌ra kache atmasamarpana karachi.’
Ara abasya'i amara samuda sampradayera kache tadera bha'i salehake pathiyechilama e adesasaha ye, ‘tomara allah‌ra ‘ibadata kara [1],’ ete tara du’dale bibhakta haye bitarke lipta hala
Tini balalena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara kena kalyanera age akalyana tbaranbita karate caccha [1]? Kena tomara allah‌ra kache ksama prarthana karacha na, yate tomara rahamata pete para?’

Tara balala, ‘tomake o tomara sange yara ache taderake amara amangalera karana mane kari [1].’ Saleha balalena, ‘tomadera ‘kulaksana grahana kara’ allah‌ra ikh‌tiyare, bastuta tomara emana eka sampradaya yaderake pariksa kara hacche [2].’
Ara se sahare chila emana naya byakti [1], yara dese biparyaya srsti karata ebam sansodhana karata na

Tara balala, ‘tomara paraspara allahara name sapatha grahana kara, amara rate'i sesa kare deba take o tara paribara-parijanake; tarapara tara abhibhabakake niscita kare balaba ye, ‘tara paribara-parijana hatya amara pratyaksa karini; ara amara abasya'i satyabadi [1].’
Ara tara eka cakranta karechila ebam amara'o eka kausala abalambana karalama, athaca tara upalabdhi'o karate pareni
Ata'eba dekhuna, tadera cakrantera parinama ki hayeche--- amara to taderake o tadera sampradayera sakalake dhbansa karechi
Sutaram e to tadera gharabari--- yulumera karane ya janasun'ya abasthaya pare ache; niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche, se sampradayera jan'ya yara jane
Ara amara ud'dhara karechilama taderake, yara imana enechila. Ara tara taka'oya abalambana karata
Ara smarana karuna lutera katha [1], tini tara sampradayake balechilena, ‘tomara jene-dekhe [2] kena aslila kaja karacha
‘tomara ki kamatrptira jan'ya narike chere puruse upagata habe? Tomara to eka ajna [1] sampradaya.’
